problem.markdown:
In this comparison, which computer part is analogous to the brain?
[[Motherboard, (CPU/Processor), RAM, Video Card, Power Supply, Hard Disk, Optical Drive]]
[explanation] The CPU is like the brain of the machine because it is responsible for all computations that the computer must do. [explanation]
problem.p: In this comparison, which computer part is analogous to the brain?

div.p: The CPU is like the brain of the machine because it is responsible for all computations that the computer must do.
